name: Selhorys
summary: Selhorys is a walled town on the eastern continent. Although large it is still considered a town - not an independent city - and is ruled from Old Volantis. It is situated at the confluence of the Selhoru and the Rhoyne. It lies to the north of Valysar and to the northwest of Volantis.[1]
